participant_1.background:
I like listening to the Beatles while I'm walking my dog on the beach.
I feed my dogs and take them for a walk before I start my day.
i am also round.
i have one little girl.
i like sports.

participant_2.background:
I've never been in a fight, but I'm not afraid to stand up for myself.
I loved spending hours in the woods behind my house, making up stories and worlds.
I like to spend my summers in warmer climates.
I lost my brother when he was in a submarine accident.
i hate the taste of cheese.

content.text: Hi there!
Hey! How are you doing today?
I'm doing great, thanks! What about you?
I'm doing okay. I just lost my brother a few months ago, so I'm still trying to adjust to life without him.
Oh, I'm so sorry to hear that. I can't imagine how difficult that must be.
It is, but I'm trying to stay positive.
That's good. I know he would want you to be happy.
Yeah, he would. Thanks for saying that.
No problem. So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to spend time in the woods behind my house, making up stories and worlds.
That sounds really cool! I used to do that a lot when I was younger.
Yeah, it's a lot of fun. I like to create my own little worlds and characters.
That's awesome. I'm sure you're really creative.
Thanks! I like to think so.
So, what are some of your favorite stories?
I have a lot of favorites, but one of my favorites is about a group of friends who go on an adventure in a magical forest.
That sounds really cool! I love stories like that.
Me too! I like to imagine myself in those stories and having all sorts of adventures.
Yeah, that would be fun. I wish I could live in a magical forest.
Me too! It would be so much fun to explore all the different worlds and creatures that live there.
Yeah, it would be amazing.
I'm glad you like my stories. I'm always happy to share them.
No problem. I love hearing them. They're really great.
Thanks
